drawScreenQuad(float) - Static method in class org.dark.shaders.util.ShaderLib
This function draws a quad formatted to fit the whole screen, with texture coordinates mapped such that the entire screen texture (which is usually a size like 2048x2048) is represented by the range [0,0] to [1,1].
